message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Can you meet me at $120?
I understand that $150 is a bit high for you, but I really want to make a deal happen. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135. This is my best offer, but I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $120. Can you consider $125?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product! I can do $130, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price!
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above $125. Can you do $128?
I'm not willing to go up to $128, but I'm willing to meet you at $129. This is my last offer, and I hope you can accept it!
I appreciate your last offer, but I'm still not willing to pay $129. I'm willing to meet you at $125, and that's my final offer.
I've already made several concessions, and I'm not willing to go back to $125. I'm willing to meet you at $127. This is my final offer, and I hope you can accept it!
I'm really not willing to go above $125. I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.
